message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product available for you at a price of $10000. It is of exceptional quality, and I am confident you will find it highly valuable. This is my first offering, so I am eager to build trust and a strong relationship with you. Would you be interested in learning more about the product?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm and willingness to build a relationship. However, with no previous sales data to assess the quality of your products, I'm hesitant to purchase at this time. Perhaps if you were to offer a lower price, or if you could provide some additional information about the product, I would be more inclined to consider your offer.
